answers.junior: @Autowired tells Spring to automatically inject dependencies. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
answers.middle: @Autowired performs dependency injection by type matching. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Can be used on constructors, setters, and fields. Use @Qualifier for disambiguation.
answers.senior: @Autowired uses type-based autowiring with optional required attribute. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Resolution: by type, then by qualifier, then by name. Constructor injection preferred over field.
answers.tricky: Discuss autowiring modes, circular dependency resolution, required vs optional, and comparison with @Inject and @Resource. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
